name: Cyber Mayhem (Eduardo Soto - sotocodes)
description:
Protect your base for as long as possible without dying!!

Controls:

  • wasd - movement
  • mouse scroll - zoom level
  • space - impulse (boost speed)
  • left click - shoot
  • escape - quit game (pc or mac)

Developer - Eduardo Soto (sotocodes)

Music by - Daniel A. Ward
